org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text.impl

Class Glyph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text.LowLevelTextObject
      • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text.impl.Glyph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeContainer, ContentObject, TextContent, TextContentVariants, TextObject, GeometricObject, org.primaresearch.ident.Identifiable, org.primaresearch.labels.HasLabels

    public class Glyph
extends LowLevelTextObject
    Specialised low level text object representing glyphs within a page layout.
    Author:
    clc

      • getGraphemes

        public java.util.List<GraphemeElement> getGraphemes()
        Returns a list of all graphemes of this glyph. Creates an empty list, if no list exists yet.
        Returns:
        List (might be empty)

      • createGraphemeElement

        public GraphemeElement createGraphemeElement(java.lang.String id,
                                             LowLevelTextType type,
                                             GraphemeGroup group)
        Creates a new grapheme, grapheme group, or non-printing character object and adds it to this glyph
        Parameters:
        id - Preferred ID for the grapheme element (not guaranteed, check the returned line for the actual ID)
        group - Optional group to add the new element to (set to null to add it to the glyph)
        Returns:
        New grapheme element
